name: SpongeBob Creator!
description:
Use the slider variables to change SpongeBob's arms, body, and face! You can import by typing a code (4 digits) from 1 to 6. You can save your code by typing it in the comments.

Code examples:

2163 = Krusty Krab

3544 = Kah-Rah-Tae

1111 = Normal

2566 = Double-Spatula!

5233 = Glove World!
